1/* mpq_out_str(stream,base,integer) */

32#include <stdio.h>
33#include "gmp.h"
34#include "gmp-impl.h"
35
36
37size_t
38mpq_out_str (FILE *stream, int base, mpq_srcptr q)
39{
40 size_t written;
41
42 if (stream == NULL)
43 stream = stdout;
44
45 written = mpz_out_str (stream, base, mpq_numref (q));
46
47 if (mpz_cmp_ui (mpq_denref (q), 1) != 0)
48 {
49 putc ('/', stream);
50 written += 1 + mpz_out_str (stream, base, mpq_denref (q));
51 }
52
53 return ferror (stream) ? 0 : written;
54}
55
